resources.string: Unable to start the app. Try again.
Tap on the name of a list to view the items in that list
Swipe a list name to delete that list
Tap on Create a new list to start a new list
and delete all of its items? This cannot be undone!
For each field enter the name of the field
For each field select the field type
date: use for date values (sorts by date)
email: use for email addresses (will appear as suggested email addresses when emailing any list)
email addresses in encrypted lists will not appear as suggested email addresses for other lists
number: use for number values (sorts numerically)
phone: use for phone numbers (can be pasted into the phone app)
There can only be one photo field in a list
Any photo field will always be the last field in the list
text: use for normal text (sorts alphabetically)
time: use for time values (sorts by time)
url: use for web site addresses (can be pasted into the browser app)
Select Field sorting: Ascending to use this field for sorting the list with ascending values in this field
Select Field sorting: Descending to use this field for sorting the list with descending values in this field
More than one field can be used to sort a list
If Field sorting: is Off for all fields in the list, the items in the list will appear in the order they were entered
Change the value under Field order: if you want to change the order of the columns in the list
Changing a text field to a non-text type will cause the values for that field to be deleted
Update the field value next to the field name
Flip the filters switch to filter the list based on the value of that field
More than one field can be used to filter the list
to add or change a photograph in the list
If the list contains phone numbers:
to enter the phone number into the phone app
to go to that web site
Warning! This list is encrypted, if you proceed the data will be emailed without encryption.
Unable to open list. Restart app.
Do you want to delete this list item?
If you click YES you will lose all data for fields:
In Enter list name: enter the name of the list
Tap Add a new list field to add a new column to the list
Swipe a field to remove it from the list
Enter the field value next to the field name
to add a photograph to the list
Flip the filters switch to filter the list using that item value
There are no email clients installed.
Photographs are not allowed in an encrypted list
Please add at least one field to the list
Only one photo field is allowed in a list, the photo field must be the last field in the list

The password must contain:
at least one number
at least one lower case letter
at least one upper case letter
and at least one special character
Can not sort by a photo field
Do you want to delete the list
Unable to restart the app. Try again.
Do you want to remove encryption for this list?
Do you want to add encryption for this list? If you encrypt the list, you will be required to enter a password each time you enter the list.
to find a phrase in the list (search is case insensitive)
Use *phrase to search for a word that ends with the phrase
Use phrase* to search for a word that starts with the phrase
Use phrase1*phrase2 to search for items that contain phrase1 followed by phrase2
Tap the field names to update the layout of the list or to select fields to sort by
Tap on a list item to view/edit that item or to filter the list with that item value
Tap on Add a new item to add a new item to the list
Flip the filter switch to turn off all filtering for the list
Flip the sorting switch to turn off all sorting for the list
to import a CSV file into the list
If the list contains photographs, tap on a photograph to enlarge it
If you receive a response that says List fields mismatch, then the fields in the import file did not match the fields in the list
The first line in the input file must contain field names that match the field names in the list
The number of fields in the input file must match the number of fields in the list
If the import response shows a number of duplicate records:
the input file contained items where all the item values match an already existing item
The duplicate items were not imported
If the import response shows a number of lines with invalid dates:
the input file contained items with date values in invalid formats
the valid date formats are yyyy/mm/dd, mm/dd/yyyy and mm/dd/yy
The items with invalid date formats were not imported
If the import response shows a number of lines with invalid times:
the input file contained items with time values in invalid formats
the valid time formats are hh:mm, hh:mm AM and hh:mm PM
time values without AM or PM will be treated as 24 hour time values
time values with AM or PM will be treated as 12 hour time values
The items with invalid time formats were not imported
If the import response shows a number of lines with invalid numbers:
the input file contained items with invalid numbers
number values can only include numeric digits, decimal points and minus signs
The items with invalid numbers were not imported
If the import response shows a number of lines with invalid phone numbers:
the input file contained items with invalid phone numbers
Valid phone numbers have at least 7 numeric digits and at most 20 numeric digits
The items with invalid phone numbers were not imported
